metadata.title: CVE-2018-8971 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The Auth0 integration in GitLab before 10.3.9, 10.4.x before 10.4.6, and10.5.x before 10.5.6 has an incorrect omniauth-auth0 configuration, leadingto signing in unintended users.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
